Pre-Game Insights: Lithuania and Cyprus are competing in Group C2 of the Nations League.
Lithuania has kept clean sheets in three of their last four matches, showcasing strong defensive form.
Cyprus have failed to win a competitive away match since 2019, losing 14 out of their last 17 such encounters.
Both teams have struggled to score, with Cyprus averaging just 0.4 goals per game in their Euro 2024 qualification campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The prediction of under 2.5 goals is the most likely outcome due to both teams' struggles in scoring.
Lithuania’s improvement in defence has been a significant factor in their recent successes.
Cyprus’ failure to score consistently, combined with Lithuania’s cautious approach in recent fixtures, suggests that this match is likely to be tightly contested.
